value.title: Avoid Parameter Error when refreshing a Power BI partition
value.excerpt: Ever run into a Parameter error when trying to refresh a partition in Power BI? It can drive you BANANAS! Patrick explains how to get around it and refresh successfully.   游닉 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want to take your Power BI skills to the next level?

value.title: Brand your Report Server
value.excerpt: I break down how to make a branding package for SQL Server Reporting Services 2016. I compare it from the original skin, to the multicolor brand package that Chris Finlan put together, to my custom brand package for Guy in a Cube.  Branding the web portal - https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/mt710551.aspx

value.title: Combine Power BI Report Tooltips using DAX
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shows you how to combine Power BI Report Tooltips using DAX. Just a little bit of DAX! This can be useful when you want to use a single report tooltip for multiple Power BI visuals.  LET'S CONNECT! value.title: Exploring the Visio visual in Power BI
value.excerpt: Want to explore locations with data? The Visio visual in Power BI helps you do just that! value.title: Power BI User lookup with the gateway using Active Directory
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how you can use Active Directory custom attributes for the user lookup with the Power BI Gateway. This can be used for both Analysis Services mapping and the Kerberos SSO with DirectQuery connections.  Manage your data source - Analysis Services https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/service-gateway-enterprise-manage-ssas#usernames-with-analysis-services
